articles.description: After receiving commands from flight controllers on the ground, the uncrewed SpaceX Dragon spacecraft undocked from the zenith port of the International Space Station’s Harmony module at 5:05 p.m.
articles.content:
The SpaceX Dragon cargo craft is pictured departing the vicinity of the space station following its undocking from the Harmony modules space-facing port.
